name: df-bases
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(ctb, cab(s0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wral(s2, cv(s0), wss(cin(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cuni(cin(cv(s0), cpw(cin(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))))))
comment: Define the class of topological bases. Equivalent to definition of basis in [Munkres] p. 78 (see ~ isbasis2g ). Note that "bases" is the plural of "basis". (Contributed by NM, 17-Jul-2006.)
